bank_account.title: Bank Account
bank_account.description: Bank account items added to user's company.

api_id.description: Identifier of the account when pulled from API Source

api_type.description: Type of the source API of the account

financial_account_id.description: The Financial account the bank account belongs to.

company_id.description: Company identifier of the company where the account belongs to.

updated_at.description: when the item was last updated

indinero_status.description: inDinero status of the bank account

svb_account_number.description: SVB account number if the account is from SVB

intuit_id.description: Identifier of the account when pulled from Intuit

links.description: This endpoint retrieves all bank accounts.
links.title: List

category.title: Category
category.description: A chart of accounts is a listing of the names of the accounts that a company has identified and made available for recording trransactions in its general ledger. A company has the flexibility to tailor its chart of accounts to best suit its needs, including adding accounts as needed.

company.title: Company
company.description: A company in the Indinero App.

credit_card.title: Credit Card
credit_card.description: Credit card financial accounts added to company as data source.

api_id.description: Identifier of the account when pulled from API Source

api_type.description: Type of the source API of the account

updated_at.description: when the item was last updated

links.description: This endpoint retrieves all credit cards.
links.title: List

links.description: This endpoint retrieves all root dimensions.
links.title: List

links.description: This endpoint retrieves the dimension tree of a root dimension.
links.title: Tree

financial_account.title: Financial Account
financial_account.description: Financial account items added to user's company.

last_update_attempt.description: when the item update was last attempted

updated_at.description: when the item was last updated

start_poll_time.description: Time when the poll for download started

poll_status.description: Status of the poll when updating

linked_item_id.description: Identifier of the financial account linked to this account.

routing_number.description: Routing number of the financial account

display_error.description: For the view, if the error should be displayed or not

send_banklog_email.description: Setting if the bank log email should be sent for this account

status.description: Status of the financial account, whether set to 'automatic' or 'manual'

links.description: This endpoint retrieves all financial accounts.
links.title: List

description.example: Gas for getting to client facility

company_id.description: Company identifier the reimbursement is part of.

status.description: A reimbursements status: Draft: -1, Pending: 0, For processing: 1, Rejected: 2, Processing: 3, Reimbursed: 4, Archived: 5, Cannot Process: 6

created_at.description: Time when the reimbursement was created

cannot_process_reason.description: Reason why the reimbursement was not processed

employee.description: Employee who submitted the reimbursement request

transaction.title: Transaction
transaction.description: An accounting transaction is a business event having a monetary impact on the financial statements of a business. It is recorded in the accounting records of the business.

company_id.description: The ID of the company who owns the transaction

account.description: Account where the transaction was made

post_date.description: Date of posting of the transaction

container_type.description: Container type of the transaction - bank or credits

description_user.description: Transaction description input by a user

description_auto.description: Transaction description parsed by the app during import

detail.description: Description of transaction based on financial institution statements

base_type.description: Base type of the transaction: either credit or debit

currency_code.description: Currency code for the transaction amount

split_id.description: ID of the parent transaction if it's split transaction

category_id.description: ID of the category of the transaction

trends.title: Trends
trends.description: The company's financial analytics, during a certain period.

data.description: financial data points during the trend period

has_invoice_entries.description: if it includes invoices during the trend period

trends.description: list of revenues, spendings and profits

trends-cash.title: Trends: Cash
trends-cash.description: The company's cash, during a certain period.

data.description: list of cash amount per date

trends-categories.title: Trends: Categories
trends-categories.description: The company's financial analytics, during a certain period, grouped by category.

data.description: list of categories amount per date

trends-chart_data.title: Trends: Chart Data
trends-chart_data.description: The company's graph report, during a certain period.

trends-home.title: Trends: Home
trends-home.description: The company's graphical report for the month

difference.description: amount changed between the previous 2 months

trends-revenue.title: Trends: Revenue
trends-revenue.description: The company's revenue, during a certain period.

data.description: list of revenue amount per date

trends-spending.title: Trends: Spending
trends-spending.description: Company spending over a period of time.

data.description: list of spending amount per date

user.title: User
user.description: A user in the Indinero App.

authy_opted_out.description: Setting signifying the user opted out of the 2FA Feature

role.description: Role of the user in the company

permissions.description: List of features the user has permissions to. If the user is an admin, it is assumed that the user has access to all features, and checking this is unnecessary.

items.description: A feature in the app the user has access to.

links.description: Get logged in user profile photo
links.title: User Profile Photo
